apps.name: ClassFlow
apps.subtitle: Manage your classes, books and timetable with QR codes.
apps.localizedDescription:
ClassFlow helps students and instructors stay organized and focused. Whether you're managing multiple courses, tracking assignments and due dates, or coordinating live sessions and resources, ClassFlow brings everything into one simple, beautiful app.

Key capabilities

- Centralized class and course management: create and organize classes, sections, and topics.
- Assignment & due date tracking: add tasks, set deadlines, and view what's due next.
- Schedule & calendar view: weekly and monthly views to visualize classes and commitments.
- Attendance & participation logs: mark attendance, record notes, and review history (teacher view).
- Notifications & reminders: get push notifications for upcoming deadlines and class events.
- Resource sharing: attach notes, links, and files to classes and assignments.
- Cross-platform performance: native-like experience on iOS and Android thanks to Flutter and platform code.

versions.localizedDescription:
- Fixed app icon on iOS
- Fixed an issue importing saves on iOS
- Add search bars to subjects, books, and timetable lists
- Enable multi-select for bulk delete/edit of subjects and books
- Add interactive tutorial for first-time users (beyond current modal)
- Improve screen reader support, semantic labels, and contrast ratios
- Polish page transitions and add subtle micro-interactions
- iCloud/Google Drive integration for automatic backups
- Add stricter input validation and error messages for malformed data
- Implement action history for accidental deletions
- Archive old subjects/books instead of permanently deleting
- Show today's schedule prominently on home screen
- Add optional notes field to lessons for homework/reminders
- Smooth navigation with slide/scale/fade transitions
- Better error messages with duplicate detection and character limits
- Summary cards showing lesson count, next lesson, and free time
- Mark lessons as cancelled, modified, or rescheduled
- User accounts with cloud storage for data sync across devices
- Custom server configuration for self-hosted or official cloud servers
- Change password, email, enable 2FA, manage sync settings
- Queue local changes and sync when connection is available
- Smart merging when same data is modified on multiple devices
- Export timetable to PDF, iCal, or CSV formats
- Custom color themes beyond light/dark mode
- Reorder lessons and subjects with drag & drop
- Save recurring lesson patterns for quick scheduling
- Explicitly add break/lunch periods to timetable
- [CHANGE] Handle timetable display for users traveling across time zones

- Created reusable component library to reduce code duplication
- Fixed file selection for good (I think)
- Fixed all deprecation warnings
- Removed scanner on desktop
- Add "Don't show this again" in the tutorial modal
- Add file selection on all devices
